value.title: This is why SC2 isn’t played on 50% hit points (PART 2) - StarCraft 2

This time it is Special and Astrea playing in the challenge -- 🐷 Second Channel for Learning StarCraft 2: https://www.youtube.com/c/PiGRandom 🐷

value.excerpt: Welcome to the new Terran ladder series! This time, it's "Never Attack to Grandmaster!"
